events.message: I received my order but unfortunately it is not what I expected, and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The support system has identified the issue reported as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a refund.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you shortly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that the product didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unopened or used? This will help us process your refund quickly.
The order number is 123456789. The product has been opened but not used, and I would like to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid return label by email shortly. Once we receive the item, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the return label and the clear refund timeline.
The refund request has been successfully initiated. Please check your email for the return instructions and label.
Just following up to ensure your return was received and the refund processed to your satisfaction. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
Your refund case has been closed as resolved. Thank you for contacting us and we hope to serve you better next time.
